column1: プルルルル……プルルルル……プルルルル……ピ
もしもし、七草さん。どうかしましたか？
column2: Hello, Nanakusa-san. What is going on?

column1:
プロデューサーさん、近くのダンス教室に
すごい講師さんがいるという噂を聞きました～
column2:
Producer-san, I heard rumors about a great 
teacher in a nearby dancing school~.
column5:
Producer-san, I heard a rumor that there's a
great instructor at a dance school near here~

column1:
様々なジャンルのダンスに精通していて、いろいろな
パフォーマンスが習得できるみたいですよ～
column2:
They're familiar with various genres of dance
and you can learn all kinds of performances~.
column5:
She's well-versed in various genres of dance,
and it looks like you can learn to perform too!

column1:
それはすごいですね。
分かりました、今から行ってみます！
column3:
That's great.
Okay, I will go there now!
column5:
That's amazing.
Understood, I'll go now!
